H3.text: who plays timon in lion king on broadway. Max Casella

A4.text: The cast included Simon Gregor as Timon.

A5.text: In 1994, Lane voiced Timon, the meerkat, in Disney's blockbuster animated film The Lion King

A6.text: In 1995, Lane was the voice of the meerkat in the early episodes of Timon & Pumbaa

A7.text: In 1997, Casella played Timon in the original Broadway production of The Lion King
